snippet: BAER--Lt. Col. Leo, USAR (Retired). Born Nuembrecht, Germany, January 24, 1918, passed away March 29 at his home in New York. Married happily for 66 years to Lore, nee Lebrecht. Survived by Hannah and Ed Baer, Anne and Lennard Loewentritt, and many adoring great-nieces and nephews, and friends. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BAER--Lt. Col. Leo, USAR (Retired). Born Nuembrecht, Germany, January 24, 1918, passed away March 29 at his home in New York. Married happily for 66 years to Lore, nee Lebrecht. Survived by Hannah and Ed Baer, Anne and Lennard Loewentritt, and many adoring great-nieces and nephews, and friends. 1/3
